attributes.action: The British People voted for Brexit, so let the British People vote for their PM
attributes.background:
The choice of the British public to choose their countries direction has been made through Brexit.  

Now the British people  should be able to choose their leader to run the country, not a handful of MPs . 

Leaders who encouraged Brexit should also be considered for this role.

rejection.details:
The relevant time for this action has passed. If you want a general election to be called, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/122946
